wikipedia_page.main: Carl Ablett (born 19 December 1985) is an English former professional rugby league footballer who played as a second-row, loose forward or centre for the Leeds Rhinos in the Betfred Super League and England at international level.Ablett spent time on loan from Leeds at the London Broncos in the Super League in 2005.

The first Dream Team to be made up of entirely English players.
